title: Did not receive RP
body: I bought RP and never received it. I got charged and an email confirmation.

replies.body:
We've had some issues lately with the Store being overloaded by all the transactions going on with the new content purchases, sorry about that! If you reach out to our billing team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to work with you to  resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
